aaef2d02d5de3f38.voiceContent: I leave it to you to bring me around and taste the local snacks and specialties, alright?

c9af55c9e2ac1285.voiceContent: A kitchen? Haha, how intriguing! You know, I used to cook quite often. Let me show you a thing or two!

bfce58f1c9154056.voiceContent: Ah, such a rich aroma truly makes you feel refreshed and alive.

19dca9baa945d4ab.voiceContent: I wonder... dare you accept my challenge?

301286fa956185b9.voiceContent: I've tasted dishes from both Liuli Pavilion and Xinyue Kiosk, but you can't fully appreciate a country's cuisines if you only stick to high-end restaurants.

6f3d37c1b3e97c62.voiceContent: The arts of cooking and war aren't so different. Tasting your opponent's dishes is also a form of battle.

6cfe79810d48e251.voiceContent: I want to take you to see the scenery of my homeland.

a928d95f8e5d5c5d.voiceContent: Oh, and I almost forgot! I can also make authentic Borsch for you with specialty ingredients from my hometown.

87e91b35de2a9b46.voiceContent: Mmm, seems like I'll have to give my family a heads-up.

3ed4ab7a1a260eae.voiceContent: Hmm... When can you spare a few weeks?

929d6ff238623580.voiceContent: What do you say? Do you accept my proposal?

fcbd6d5057dc66a3.voiceContent: Some people even carve gigantic ice sculptures there.

9f8999a792305199.voiceContent: Of course. I'm more than willing.

b3f706f858a964b8.voiceContent: It's the perfect place to make a home.

88574d9549f68d9f.voiceContent: If a friend will join you outside in the bitter cold to drink Fire-Water and chat together, you know they're the kind of person you want with you on the battlefield.

ccc6151367ab6edb.voiceContent: It's already that time of the night, huh...

2e1c3f8d1b6354d4.voiceContent: I would join you for just such a conversation.

d791cd74663dbd4b.voiceContent: If you joined me on my path to world domination, we would be unstoppable.

724bc0ce96bace45.voiceContent: Hahaha, sorry, I didn't mean it like that.

190386d8127a27f4.voiceContent: I just think that Tonia and the others would be very happy in your company.

4146ffa6cbb0f7c0.voiceContent: I can see it now, the beaming smiles on their faces as they gather around and read the letter.

16856dd282c7f84e.voiceContent: If there's ever a battle that even you find a challenge, don't forget to call me.

d8baf98610be74a5.voiceContent: And in the heat of battle, I know that you'd have my back.

d1550125150ee2f5.voiceContent: Who knows when we'll meet next...

c8d632e74be065d6.voiceContent: I'd love to bring Tonia, Anthon, and Teucer to stay here...

63bec3784e4ad65e.voiceContent: I've grown quite a bit stronger. You ready for some sparring?

2f456b9ec5e40c36.voiceContent: In Snezhnaya, there's a kind of liquor called Fire-Water.

3a44bf686cc0e78c.voiceContent: ...And, of course, we have to go ice fishing! The fish are much larger than the ones you find in ponds.

4f24bb575ff94a5a.voiceContent: If you like snowball fights, I'll pair with you and we can face off against my siblings.

118e6571465d1a67.voiceContent: ...Haha, kidding! You're here because there's something you want to say, right?

a5736976d8b33f95.voiceContent: This is the level of trust I place in you.

73ad8b6fe27f98b2.voiceContent: Hah, you lack conviction in your own abilities.

eb411f8950a8c4d0.voiceContent: To gaze upon the endless snowy sky, to stand on frozen lakes that won't shatter, no matter how hard you tread.

fca8ec9fda7ae56c.voiceContent: It's a Witch-Ray that will turn you into a little lamb if it hits you — so stay out of its way!

cc09aa650883100f.voiceContent: I don't know — but if there's a chance it's where Teucer is, we need to stop this before things get ugly.

8686079e64374cb7.voiceContent: No matter. Hand the Gnosis over. Now. Don't make me take it from you.

aef66489bed94907.voiceContent: This chance is hard to come by, so show me all you've got.

9245d271bc0a696a.voiceContent: Good! No wonder Signora was so wary of you.

54ba568190445d5c.voiceContent: Now, show me what you can do against the might of a Harbinger!

05b6f6a2742ca6a0.voiceContent: So very few ever get the chance to square off with a Fatui Harbinger.

13cd0469787cb373.voiceContent: Well, that just means I can go all out! Brace yourself, this is about to get tough...

b01f509b69599421.voiceContent: So come now, amuse me... and don't you dare disappoint.

c4664d9a83dd851c.voiceContent: You can run, but you can't hide!

c8f639ac3142ac3e.voiceContent: Brace yourself, this is gonna hurt!

be3ec42a2628d741.voiceContent: Not bad... Not bad at all!

652cea33a2166340.voiceContent: Now I just need to get my hands on the rest!

79f61929427c840a.voiceContent: What's the matter, out of practice?

6f2108318109c569.voiceContent: Need to end a few enemies?

7597a9f2683d570e.voiceContent: I'm No. 11 of the Fatui Harbingers, codename Childe, but I also go by Tartaglia. And you... Hmm, you too like to cause quite the stir, don't you? Something tells me we're going to get along splendidly.

61dc9297111b8d18.voiceContent: You know, there are better ways to seek out our enemies than... well, standing here.

cc67a07c8581e69f.voiceContent: This place is pretty dead... By which I mean, there's nothing to kill.

7355be86016f6536.voiceContent: I wonder what the rest of the Harbingers are up to? Plotting and scheming on an ever-grander scale, no doubt.

1ccb4c6d4c49cda5.voiceContent: Where I'm from, if we didn't keep moving, we'd freeze to death. Literally.

03af63218321a807.voiceContent: Ah, perfect weather for fishing! The sound of the rain scares them away, but once it stops, they're yours for the taking.

0085260dde51ed61.voiceContent: Haha, ahh... could it be snowing in Snezhnaya too?

e42fdf762b1a0558.voiceContent: Just look at that wind blow!

a64a1805afbeb3be.voiceContent: The world looks glorious in the snow. Pure white, like the light of the moon. A perfect backdrop for bloodshed.

6d18fb17f429004c.voiceContent: The wind is picking up. There is conflict in the air.

00b4183133c91ec4.voiceContent: Morning, comrade! You're raring to go today, I see.

e717c5bf71aa6aa0.voiceContent: You look well. What's your secret? Care to exchange notes?

911ff879a4eedd5e.voiceContent: Whew, dinner was quite the feast. A spot of exercise is in order.

3d9a490dc64250d6.voiceContent: Today was great. See you tomorrow, comrade!

45fbc8ca464d1d29.voiceContent: A warrior must always be ready to face any challenge with his blade. The outcome of the battle is irrelevant — what matters is that you learn from the experience.

eb9c98c4c53397d9.voiceContent: You wield such powers without owning a Vision... I really am excited to see what you have in store for us... Let's see how far you can go. Just don't go dying on me before you lay it all on the line in our final battle! I won't allow it!

69df3ecd08937a58.voiceContent: Comrade, how would you like to join the Fatui? ...Actually, scrap that. With your capabilities, you and I could head-to-head with the Harbingers and win. Wouldn't want to miss an opportunity like that.

368fd5c5fceaa277.voiceContent: Ah, I'm sure the Harbingers must know of my dealings with you by now. Oh, I'd love to see the look on their faces... Hahaha...

7ebe6abbfbca7b76.voiceContent: I am the least adept with a bow. And that is precisely why I must master it.

0d0b33f87ba57535.voiceContent: If it makes me stronger, I'll take it. Vision? Great. Delusion? Don't mind if I do. Heretical teachings from the Abyss? Sign me up.

78f43493aa483eba.voiceContent: The skeletal-white snowscape devours life without leaving any trace. It is the invisible enemy we fight against each day.

7393700ab1fd6290.voiceContent: I once ventured deep into the abyss and came face-to-face with an enormous beast. I don't know its name, all I know is the sight of it chilled me to the bone. But mark my words, one day I will march back in there and behead that beast, and you, comrade, will be my witness!

52c27b66d23ea6ec.voiceContent: Varka? Just the thought of one day going head-to-head with him in combat, the fabled Knight of Boreas himself, titan of the Knights of Favonius... It makes me buzz with excitement. It's a beautiful life we live in this world.

a52ff77c40b0f1a7.voiceContent: It's been years since I last saw my master. I should hope that next we meet, I'll at least be able to force her to use both hands to beat me...

210647a1f0696346.voiceContent: There's far more to that man than meets the eye. As for the extent of his power... lots to look forward to, I think.

b6f1a5287c7509fe.voiceContent: I've seen him in battle before, and oh what a sight it was. Perhaps I'm ranked too low for him to notice me right now. Well, he may not recognize my strengths yet, but one day, I'll show him what I'm made of.

9fe694a82720abea.voiceContent: I heard that he took segments of himself at different ages, made prostheses out of them, and assigned different tasks to each one. I know... all my comrades are a little weird. Well, come to think of it, if I met another version of myself... Hah, we'd have to fight then and there to decide which one of us gets to survive.

6ad97e01ee968099.voiceContent: The Fatui Harbingers are ranked by strength, and I have no idea why that girl is No. 3. I'd test my skills with every Harbinger who ranks above me if I had the chance, but when it comes to her... something just doesn't feel right. Anyway, you should be careful around her.

914a75aabcb5a8a9.voiceContent: Tell me, how has Mr. Zhongli been lately? Not bad, you say? Seems he's had no problem acclimating to mortal life. Hmph, he sure had me fooled. Such a fiasco mustn't be so easily forgiven! The only way to reconciliation is fierce combat! What do you mean I'm no match for him? Hahaha...

c6f5a4bc638244d7.voiceContent: Her Royal Highness the Tsaritsa is actually a gentle soul. Too gentle, in fact, and that's why she had to harden herself. Likewise, she declared war against the whole world only because she dreams of peace. And because she made an enemy of the world, I had the chance to become acquainted with you.

2e849112f6f25cf6.voiceContent: He was the first ever Fatui Harbinger, and today he is our leader. He only appears on important occasions. As for his accomplishments... To be honest, I don't really care. I owe my loyalty and devotion to the Tsaritsa, no one else.

cc918e759b3cf894.voiceContent: Remember, comrade, one day I will conquer the world!

796d1c5ce8fa8a0b.voiceContent: Face me in person, man to man, and I'll always have a chance of beating you. Same goes if you're a deity or a monster from the abyss. But the Harbingers? They are more enamored with their intangible methods, spending their days scheming and maneuvering. This is why we cannot get along.

20252a6664ba5e42.voiceContent: However far away my motherland may be, we all live under the same sky. That snow-white moon... My family must be able to see it too. I hope my siblings... *sigh* I hope that they have turned out to be formidable warriors as well.

3dffe890120ba959.voiceContent: Comrade, a word of advice Don't go yelling stupid things in the heat of battle. They might sound good in your head, but if you think about it, they make no sense at all. I'm talking about things like, I'm on fire! That's the last thing we want. Fire leaves behind nothing but ashes. And you must survive at all costs.

bc428e98556b8bd8.voiceContent: Ah, how time flies. One day, you will see how I conquer the world and crush the thrones of gods beneath my heel. In the meantime... no dying, comrade! Keep yourself alive! Hahaha.

540f45b442b2cf08.voiceContent: Ice fishing and combat follow the same principle. Patience and decisiveness are key. Though having said that... I suppose the same is true of everything in life.

761a2370f5e3eb4d.voiceContent: My pet peeves? Hmm, well, to be honest, I'm far too busy journeying with you and slaying powerful enemies to dwell on such trifling matters.

114c06c6498c7b33.voiceContent: There's plenty of delicious food to sink your teeth into in this world... and plenty of fights to sink your teeth into as well. Life is beautiful.

3f46e3e6e2c62afd.voiceContent: Food is like weaponry. A true warrior never deliberates unduly over their choice of weapon, nor do they do so over the food they eat. Neither should you.

f7af1ced3caeb80c.voiceContent: Eating delicious food really has a way of taking all your cares away. Now, how should I repay you?

9c05eeb57f43b8e6.voiceContent: Your cooking skills seem to have improved quite a lot. Does that mean you're getting stronger all the time, too?

2d77e93b89349982.voiceContent: Um, I'll admit the taste surprises me a little. Hmm? Okay... I'll try one more bite.

8a303c8a530977b9.voiceContent: Happy birthday, comrade! Anyone you need knocked off their perch today? Let me know. I'll happily oblige...

d68d7e8ed8de5db7.voiceContent: Hohoho, I feel like I've gotten stronger! Now, who shall I use as my guinea pig...

013c90a652c0e8d0.voiceContent: A warrior's strength is like a dome. The bigger the dome, the more opponents he can challenge inside it. Hmm, who was it that said this again?

82f9ea9e0f610651.voiceContent: Bravo, comrade! Thanks to your help, I am one step closer to my goal of conquering the world. I doubt even the Tsaritsa herself ever expected I would make it this far.

65202c7462116e5a.voiceContent: Comrade. Make sure you keep training too. Otherwise, who will be left to fight me to the death when the world lies defeated at my feet? Hahaha.

9024eb85f182331d.voiceContent: Death looms. My time to shine!

9ec42d3e8e920bbb.voiceContent: Look, I've got nothing against people who have their own agendas — I myself joined the Fatui to get more experience in combat. But I don't like her at all. If she stood to benefit from betraying others, she'd turn against the Tsaritsa in a heartbeat. There isn't a sane bone in her body.

8987c60c144d28fa.voiceContent: I don't know what his motivations could be, but he seems genuine about wanting to help me. He treats me just like family. Oh, and speaking of family — Tonia and Teucer are always telling me about the pastries and other gifts he brings them when they write. So while I've been away from Snezhnaya, he's kept his promise to take care of my family.

595eaa6762e3072d.voiceContent: She always seems engrossed in her research. Hmm... I wonder if those machines have anything to do with her? Anyway, I've only met her a few times, but every time she looked like she wanted to murder me. I have no idea what I possibly could have done to annoy her, though.

7bab4f63b0190571.voiceContent: Oh, now that guy has a head full of grandiose plans fueled by raw ambition. I don't understand a word he says once he starts talking about his theories... Eh, but as long as he keeps our cash reserves stocked up, I'm not complaining.

04ee7148fd8c279e.voiceContent: I never got along with her, you know that. I guess there's not much more worth saying about her at this point. When you're a harbinger, you have to accept that death could come at any time... But don't worry about me. No matter what happens, I'll do whatever it takes to keep myself alive.

42135eed07d855d3.voiceContent: I could get used to this.

4eb9ed5b9f7eabdf.voiceContent: The wind permeates all, cleansing both mind and body. Excellent.

9f8b7a8e5b0a26ea.voiceContent: After he took the Gnosis, we lost all contact with him. Now comes the task of trying to hunt it down and get it back... I actually don't mind it — it means I get to travel all over. Wonder if I'll run into you somewhere along the way?

db301b496782aa4a.voiceContent: Um, I'll admit the taste surprises me a little. Hmm? Okay... I'll try one more bite.

a4140b6cabe3f9be.voiceContent: Your cooking skills seem to have improved quite a lot. Does that mean you're getting stronger all the time, too?

aaa90f881c2ab224.voiceContent: Eating delicious food really has a way of taking all your cares away. Now, how should I repay you?

59f524090724aeac.voiceContent: Yeah, I lost. Who would've thought you'd be so good at this?

1cf064c9515bee90.voiceContent: You played well, but I bested you nonetheless.

c2f1a8429395d1a8.voiceContent: You're leaving? I just came up with a new combo, why not stay and play a few more rounds?

2f15e3db1b8272eb.voiceContent: The game is fun to play, and carrying the deck around isn't too much of an inconvenience. The only downside is that... worthy opponents are quite hard to come by.

92e635570438de0f.voiceContent: Sure. Let's both go all out!

3f8722e920b143bf.voiceContent: Well played, friend! I had a great time.

816d016813e4f889.voiceContent: Tsk, I got careless is all.

91b7c0f0289f6cd6.voiceContent: Huh, I give you an inch, and you take a mile. Fine... the victory is all yours.

7cd8950135686bb8.voiceContent: You seem to be in pretty good form... Alright then, prepare to have a taste of my true power.

05f98fc016714a9b.voiceContent: A negligible mistake — not a problem at all.

a1dfdbf206f30d29.voiceContent: Let's see how you'll deal with this!

852f41da04241f24.voiceContent: What's going on? This isn't like you at all.

a562a1145cd8d5bb.voiceContent: It's no fun if you're almost falling asleep.

84061dc859a37552.voiceContent: There's nothing quite like the thrill of being on the brink of defeat.
